channel.title: Timeline of the City's History: 1879 on Homicide in Chicago 1870-1930
channel.description: Recent content in Timeline of the City's History: 1879 on Homicide in Chicago 1870-1930

item.title: The Ariel Bicycle Club
item.description: The Ariel Bicycle Club, Organized in 1879, was extremely popular in the eighties. The high wheels, introduced in 1876, were in vogue until 1884 when ‘safeties’ came into use. Courtesy of “Chicago and Its Makers” (Chicago: Felix Mendelsohn, 1929). Other images from this year
